snippet.title: Destiny Connect: Tick-Tock Travelers - Adventure of a Timeline | PS4
snippet.description:
Learn more @ https://nisamerica.com/games/destiny-connect/

Sherry is determined to save her home, no matter how bizarre or dangerous it gets. But when the past, present, and future are at your fingertips, there's no telling where you will go and who you will meet!

Destiny Connect: Tick-Tock Travelers takes place in the town of Clocknee, which is celebrating the advent of a new year with their annual fireworks show. Time suddenly comes to halt during the festivities, and a horde of hostile animated machines appears! Together with her friend Pegreo, and Isaac, the time-traveling robot, Sherry must unravel the mystery behind the strange events in Clocknee!

Coming to PlayStation®4 on October 22 (US), and October 25 (EU).
